message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.LG

The paper proposes a technique for automatic subtitle generation and semantic video summarization using NLP-based text summarization algorithms. This involves speech recognition and text summarization, which are techniques commonly used in the fields of multimedia (cs.MM), natural language processing (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), computer vision (cs.CV), and machine learning (cs.LG). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
